questions.question: What is the term for 'grace' in the Tetum language?
Which of the following is NOT one of the main topics covered in Learning Unit 6?
choices: Integrating grace into family and community life
Exploring the history of grace in Timor-Leste
questions.answer: Exploring the history of grace in Timor-Leste

questions.question: What is one of the suggested practical experiences for community engagement?
choices: Organize community meditation sessions in local sacred spaces
Host a national conference on grace
Create a new political party based on grace principles
questions.answer: Organize community meditation sessions in local sacred spaces

questions.question: Which of the following is a required resource for the module?
What is one of the suggested items to cover in the module?
choices: The role of traditional Timorese spiritual practices in cultivating grace
The impact of Western pop culture on grace in Timor-Leste
The economic benefits of grace-based businesses
The scientific measurement of grace levels in individuals
questions.answer: The role of traditional Timorese spiritual practices in cultivating grace

questions.question: What type of texts are suggested as resources that align with grace concepts?
What is one of the additional resources mentioned for the module?
choices: Virtual reality simulations of grace experiences
Recordings of guided meditations in Tetum and other local languages
questions.answer: Recordings of guided meditations in Tetum and other local languages

questions.question: What is the main lesson from the story of 'The Bamboo and the Storm'?
choices: Rigidity is the key to survival
True strength comes from adaptability and grace
Young trees are stronger than old ones
questions.answer: True strength comes from adaptability and grace

questions.question: Which of the following is NOT mentioned as a challenge to grace in Timorese society?
What is one of the strategies suggested for cultivating grace in daily life?
choices: Strict adherence to a grace rulebook

questions.question: Which of the following is identified as a key challenge in Timor-Leste?
What is one of the elements of a grace-based personal practice mentioned in the lecture notes?
What is suggested as a way to measure progress in one's grace practice?
choices: Counting the number of compliments received

questions.question: Which of the following is NOT mentioned as a common obstacle to maintaining a grace practice?
What is one way suggested to adapt grace practices to Timorese culture?
What type of project are students asked to design in the group activity?
choices: A community initiative based on grace principles
questions.answer: A community initiative based on grace principles

questions.question: What is one of the evaluation criteria for the community grace initiative project?
What is included in the daily grace practice checklist?
Which local resource for grace support is mentioned?
What does the Timorese proverb 'The tree with the deepest roots bends most in the wind' relate to?
According to the reading, what forms the bedrock of Timorese culture?
What is mentioned as a successful approach to community healing in Timor-Leste?
choices: Combining traditional rituals with modern conflict resolution techniques
Mandatory grace education for all citizens
questions.answer: Combining traditional rituals with modern conflict resolution techniques

questions.question: What type of initiative is mentioned as an example of grace-based community action in rural areas?
What is identified as a challenge to living gracefully in Timor-Leste?
According to the reading, what do Timorese who embrace grace often report feeling?
What is suggested as a way to integrate grace into work life?
What type of grace-based initiative is mentioned for youth in Dili?
According to the reading, what is one potential societal benefit of communities prioritizing grace?
What does the reading suggest about the relationship between grace and Timor-Leste's future?
choices: Grace is irrelevant to the country's development
Grace hinders progress and should be abandoned
Grace offers a promising foundation for societal development
Grace is only important for religious institutions
questions.answer: Grace offers a promising foundation for societal development
